title: Vegg's Restaurante
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Buffet, Take-out, Middle Eastern
description: Vegetariano e vegano. All-you-can-eat buffet, including drinks (2 types of juices) and desserts. Vegetables and legumes appear in rotation on the table dishes and include okra, chayote, spinach, cassava, sweet potato and more. Hummus and pita bread gives an Arabic touch to the selection. On Wednesdays and Saturdays also serves feijoada vegetables.
